title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Context
- Name / Institution:
- Course name + level (grad/undergrad):
- Where you imagine using this (week/topic):

## 1) Fit
Where (if anywhere) would this module fit in a course you teach?

## 2) Clarity
What was confusing or missing for you to run it?

## 3) Workload
Does the scope feel right for one session / one week?

## Optional
- Permission to quote anonymously in acknowledgements? (Yes/No)
- Would you like to be acknowledged as an adopter? (Yes/No)
